2019 4 A: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
2019 4 B: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
2019 4 C: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
2019 4 D: One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.
2019 4 E: I hated every minute of training, but I said "Don't Quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion."
2019 4 F: It ain't over till its over.
2019 4 G: Your never a loser till you quit trying.
2019 4 H: Let us never negotiate out of fear. But let us never fear to negotiate.
2019 4 I: There are no great limits to growth because there are no limits of human intelligence, imagination, and wonder.
2019 4 J: Life is a movie, pick your own role, climb your own ladder or you dig your own hole.
2019 4 K: We all get distracted, the question is, would you bounce back or bounce backwards?
2019 4 L: During your life, never stop dreaming. No one can take away your dreams.
2019 4 M: A great man is hard on himself; a small man is hard on others.
2019 4 O: Knowing how to think empowers you far beyond those who know only what to think.
2019 4 P: Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
2019 4 Q: It's not about the number of hours you practice, it's about the number of hours your mind is present during the practice.
2019 4 R: Even a broke clock is right twice a day.
2019 4 S: It's not about what you're capable of, it's about what you're willing to do.
2019 4 T: I've never really been aware of what is said about me, whether it's positive or negative. I ignore it. I've always had the mindset: "No one can challenge me better than myself."
2019 4 U: The hardest thing to do is work hard when no one is watching.
2019 4 V: If your dream ain't bigger than you, there's a problem with your dream.
2019 4 W: Don't run too fast through life. You only have one.
2019 4 X: The day you stop doing the small things is the day you think you're above everybody else.
2019 4 Y: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn
2019 4 Z: You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
2019 4 [: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
